item.title: Waabi raises $1B and expands into robotaxis with Uber
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: Waabi has secured a $750 million Series C round to accelerate autonomous trucking, and another roughly $250 million commitment from Uber to deploy 25,000 robotaxis exclusively on its platform.

item.title: Google pitches Gemini to students studying for India’s most competitive college entrance exam
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Google's launch of practice tests for JEE follows its recent move to offer full-length SAT practice tests in Gemini.

item.title: Everything you need to know about viral personal AI assistant Clawdbot (now Moltbot)
item.dc:creator: Anna Heim
item.description: Personal AI assistant Moltbot —formerly Clawdbot — has gone viral in a matter of weeks. But there’s more you should know before jumping on the bandwagon.

item.title: Anduril has invented a wild new drone-flying contest where jobs are the prize
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: This is a race series for software programmers and the brainchild of founder Palmer Luckey, he tells TechCrunch.

item.title: Anthropic reportedly upped its latest raise to $20B
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Anthropic looks to raise $20 billion at more than $300 billion valuation, according to reports.

item.title: Anthropic and OpenAI CEOs condemn ICE violence, praise Trump
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: Anthropic's Dario Amodei and OpenAI's Sam Altman spoke out against ICE enforcement tactics following Minneapolis violence, with one addressing concerns publicly and the other in an internal message.

item.title: Google’s more affordable AI Plus plan rolls out to all markets, including the US
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Gemini 3 Pro and other AI tools are now available globally through the Google AI Plus plan, which is $7.99 per month in the United States.

item.title: OpenAI launches Prism, a new AI workspace for scientists
item.dc:creator: Russell Brandom
item.description: OpenAI has launched a new scientific workspace program called Prism, which integrates AI into existing standards for composing research papers.

item.title: Google now lets users jump from AI Overviews into AI Mode conversations
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The tech giant also announced that it's making Gemini 3 the new default model for AI Overviews globally.

item.title: Risotto raises $10M seed to use AI to make ticketing systems easier to use
item.dc:creator: Russell Brandom
item.description: "Our special sauce is the prompt libraries, the eval suites, and the thousands and thousands of real-world examples that the AI gets trained on to ensure it actually does what it's expected to do,” CEO Aron Solberg told TechCrunch.

item.title: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni’s Phia raises $35M to ‘make shopping fun again’
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: “We are just at such a prime time of opportunity,” Gates said to explain the new fundraise. “Commerce itself for the consumer hasn’t really been adapted in the last 30 years, and the opportunity to make a truly personalized, end-to-end shopping experience is today.”

item.title: Airtable jumps into the AI agent game with Superagent
item.dc:creator: Connie Loizos
item.description: SuperAgent is Airtable's first stand-alone product in its 13-year history, and signals both the company's ambitions and the reality of the current AI moment: Every serious software player is racing to prove they can deliver on agents.

item.title: China’s Moonshot releases a new open source model Kimi K2.5 and a coding agent
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: The company said that the model was trained on 15 trillion mixed visual and text tokens.

item.title: Node-based design tool Flora raises $42M from Redpoint Ventures
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Flora lets customers use image, text, or video to create media assets, including images and video. Users can also use prompts to create modifications to build new nodes with multiple iterations. These generated versions are mapped with each other on a canvas to give you a tractable flow of creation.

item.title: ‘Among the worst we’ve seen’: report slams xAI’s Grok over child safety failures
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: “We assess a lot of AI chatbots at Common Sense Media, and they all have risks, but Grok is among the worst we’ve seen,” Robbie Torney of Common Sense Media said.

item.title: Qualcomm backs SpotDraft to scale on-device contract AI with valuation doubling toward $400M
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: SpotDraft now processes over 1 million contracts annually using its AI tool, with contract volumes up 173% year-over-year.

item.title: YouTubers sue Snap for alleged copyright infringement in training its AI models
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: The YouTubers claim Snap, like others, used AI datasets meant for research and academic use to train its AI models.

item.title: AI startup CVector raises $5M for its industrial ‘nervous system’
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: Now, founders Richard Zhang and Tyler Ruggles are tasked with a bigger challenge: showing customers and investors how this AI-powered software layer translates to real savings on an industrial scale.

item.title: Anthropic launches interactive Claude apps, including Slack and other workplace tools
item.dc:creator: Russell Brandom
item.description: Claude users will now be able to call up interactive apps inside the chatbot interface, with Cowork integration coming soon.

item.title: Obvious Ventures lands fund five with a 360-degree view of planetary, human, economic health
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: The 12-year-old firm raised $360,360,360 for its fifth fund. And there's a reason for that number.
